Text: KIM Its easy to subscribeDear KIM You have received this email because you are a valued customer of Platts the energy information division of The McGraw Hill Companies Its easy to subscribe to GLOBAL ENERGY BUSINESS Click here to answer a few short questions and be on your way to your FREE subscription to GLOBAL ENERGY BUSINESS surveypsurdbaspIDuserIDCBD GLOBAL ENERGY BUSINESS is the magazine of choice for energy executives and senior managers worldwide In each issue you will receive comprehensive analysis and perspective on a host of subjects essential to your firms operation including Energy Trading Risk Management Information Technologies Power Generation Energy Delivery Finance Retail Energy Business LegalRegulatory Management Strategies CorporateExecutive Profiles Click on the link below to subscribe to GLOBAL ENERGY BUSINESS surveypsurdbaspIDuserIDCBD If you feel you have received this message in error or would like to be removed from this list please click on the link below OptOutaspJobEidCBD
